trans-unit.source: Represents a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Representa um menu de atalho.

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip replaces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o ContextMenuStrip é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can associate a ContextMenuStrip with any control, and a right mouse click automatically displays the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Pode associar um ContextMenuStrip é a qualquer controlo e um clique direito do rato automaticamente apresenta o menu de atalho.

trans-unit.source: You can show a ContextMenuStrip programmatically by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode mostrar um ContextMenuStrip é através de programação utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip supports cancelable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> events to handle dynamic population and multiple-click scenarios.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip é suporta cancelable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>eventos para processar população dinâmica e clique vários cenários.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>

trans-unit.source: ContextMenuStrip supports images, menu-item check state, text, access keys, shortcuts, and cascading menus.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip é suporta imagens, estado de verificação de item de menu, texto, chaves de acesso, atalhos e menus em cascata.

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes itens são concebidos especificamente para trabalhar de forma totalmente integrada com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>em todos os orientations.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the ContextMenuStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> Shortcut menus are typically used to combine different menu items from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> of a form that are useful for the user given the context of the application.
trans-unit.target: Estão disponíveis por predefinição no momento da conceção para o controlo de ContextMenuStrip é:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>menus de atalho, normalmente, são utilizados para combinar itens de menu diferente de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>de um formulário que são úteis para o utilizador dado o contexto da aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a shortcut menu assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to provide menu items for changing the font of the text, finding text within the control, or Clipboard features for copying and pasting text.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode utilizar um menu de atalho atribuído a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo para fornecer os itens de menu para alterar o tipo de letra do texto, localizar texto no controlo ou funcionalidades de área de transferência para copiar e colar o texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also expose new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objects in a shortcut menu that are not located within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to provide situation-specific commands that are inappropriate for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to display.
trans-unit.target: Também pode expor novos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>objetos no menu de atalho que não estão localizados dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>para fornecer os comandos específicos da situação inadequados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>para apresentar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a shortcut menu is displayed when a user clicks the right mouse button over a control or the form itself.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um menu de atalho é apresentado quando um utilizador clica no botão direito do rato através de um controlo ou próprio formulário.

trans-unit.source: Many visible controls, as well as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> itself, have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property that binds the ContextMenuStrip class to the control that displays the shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Vários controlos visível, bem como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>autónomo, tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade que está vinculado a classe de ContextMenuStrip é para o controlo que apresenta o menu de atalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: More than one control can use a ContextMenuStrip.
trans-unit.target: Mais do que um controlo pode utilizar um ContextMenuStrip é.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to add space to the left of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> for a check mark that shows that the menu item is enabled or selected.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true` para adicionar espaço para a esquerda de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>para uma marca de verificação que mostra que o menu item está ativado ou selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como `true` por predefinição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use this space to the left of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> to display an image for that menu item.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este espaço para a esquerda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>para apresentar uma imagem para este item de menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Although ContextMenuStrip replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if so desired.
trans-unit.target: Embora ContextMenuStrip é substitui e adiciona a funcionalidade para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>controlo de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e para utilização futura, se assim pretender.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> class and associates it with the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> classe e associa-o contentor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> is disposed of properly, since it is not a child of the form.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para se certificar de que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>é eliminado corretamente, uma vez que não é um subordinado do formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: A component that implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that is the container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um componente que implementa <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> que é o contentor do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: Define o controlo para o estado de visível especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the control visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para tornar o controlo visíveis; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last control that caused this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último controlo que provocou este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> a apresentar.

trans-unit.source: Common uses of the SourceControl property include the following: - Adding, removing, enabling, or disabling a menu item during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizações comuns da propriedade SourceControl incluem o seguinte: - adicionar, remover, ativar ou desativar a um item de menu durante o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Opening>

trans-unit.source: - Deciding on modifications of a chosen command based on the control that last displayed the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: -Decidir modificações de um comando escolhido com base no controlo que apresentado pela última vez <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: The control that caused this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: O controlo que provocou este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> a apresentar.
